events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I want to request a refund because it does not fit as expected and I have changed my mind about the purchase.
The customer has requested a refund due to sizing issues and a change of mind on the product.
An agent from the refunds department has been assigned to handle this case regarding the customer's refund request.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m sorry to hear the jacket didn’t fit well. I’m here to assist you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the item is unused and in its original packaging to proceed with the refund?
Thank you for the quick reply. My order number is 932847. The jacket hasn't been worn, and it is still in the original packaging with all tags attached.
Great, thanks for the info! We will initiate the refund process. Please ship the jacket back using the pre-paid label we will email you shortly.
That sounds perfect, thanks! I appreciate the hassle-free return process and look forward to receiving the shipping label.
We have sent the return shipping label to your email. Once we receive the jacket, your refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm if you have sent back the jacket and if you need any further assistance with the refund process.
Yes, I sent the jacket back yesterday via the pre-paid label. Thank you for your help throughout the process!
Your returned jacket has been received and your refund was processed today. You should see the amount credited within 3-5 business days.
We are closing this case now. Thank you for shopping with us, and we hope to serve you again in the future.
